Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.GamePlayers
model.Player
public class Player extends GamePlayers
The second player in the game. Note(!) The computer opponent (AI class) is a totally different class. Player subclass that inherits from GamePlayers.
Author:
kelvin.likollari@usi.ch and ilker.kaymak@usi.ch
